To renew your driving license:
1. Login to Absher > Traffic Services
2. Select License Renewal
3. Fee: 40 SAR/year
4. Requirements: Valid eye test + pay fines

Would you like to proceed?

How can I help you with your driving license?

- Renewal (40 SAR/year)
- Lost/Damaged replacement (100 SAR)
- Check expiry date
- Check violations

What would you like to do?

To renew your passport:
1. Absher > Passports > Renew Passport
2. Choose duration (5 or 10 years)
3. Pay fees

Fees:
- 5 years: 300 SAR
- 10 years: 600 SAR

Would you like to proceed?

To renew your National ID:
1. Absher > Civil Affairs > Renew ID
2. Upload recent photo
3. Pay 100 SAR

Delivery: 3-5 business days by mail

Would you like to proceed?
ุฃุจู ุณุฌู ุฃุณุฑุฉ

Vehicle registration services:
- Renew registration: 100-300 SAR
- Transfer ownership: 150 SAR
- New plates: 100 SAR

Requirements: Valid inspection + insurance

What would you like to do?

Visa services available:
- Family visit visa: 300 SAR
- Exit/re-entry visa: 200 SAR
- Final exit visa: Free
- Visa extension: 100 SAR/month

What would you like to do?

Traffic violation services:
- Check violations: Absher > Traffic
- Pay fines: Online or bank
- Object to violation: Within 30 days

๐ก 25% discount if paid within 30 days for some violations

What would you like to do?

National Address services:
- Register: address.gov.sa (free)
- Update: Same website
- Required for: Banks, government, delivery

Your address includes: Building number, street, district, city, postal code
